Text: Special Offers from CostcocomHappy holidays from costcocom Were pleased to offer our members an exciting selection of special offers to celebrate the season Click here to view landingasplandSrcemailcampaign If you do not wish to receive these exciting offers in the future please follow the unsubscibe instructions below COSTCOCOM SPECIAL OFFERS INCLUDE Sharp Portable DVDCD Player Rebate plus shipping handling Sony DVDCD Player plus shipping handling Dr Suess How the Grinch Stole Christmas on DVD plus shipping handling Rogar Estate Wine Opener plus shipping handling TO VIEW OTHER SPECIAL OFFERS CLICK HERE landingasplandSrcemailcampaign If you cannot click on the URL within this message please copy and paste it into your browser When you submitted your rebate form you provided Costco with your email address Occasionally you will receive brief announcements regarding new items and services If you choose not to receive these announcements please FORWARD this message to with unsubscribe in the subject header Please do not click REPLY Product prices and availability are subject to change without notice If a link takes you to the costcocom homepage instead of the specific product page that product may no longer be available Instant coupon is a manufacturers coupon which will automatically be applied at checkout If you need assistance please email us at Costco Wholesale Customer Service PO Box Seattle WA
